title: The Triathlon Never Ends
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Could you tell Kanan to stop with this crazy Hell Triathlon stuff?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh!? M-me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yes, you! She has no idea how hard it is for us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Th-then you should tell Umi-chan and Eli-san too! Tell them to stop the Hell Triathlon from getting tougher!! Otherwise, Kanan-chan is gonna get all fired up and tell us that we’re leveling up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Whaaat!? No way! If Nico says that, it’d be like stirring up a hornets’ nest! They’re just going to come up with something even crazier...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You’re right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>In that case...... let’s ask someone from Nijigaku to tell Setsuna and Lanzhu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah, let’s do that. But who would be the best person to ask?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ai... would be a bad choice. She’d probably encourage them to make it tougher. How about Shizuku......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Isn’t Shizuku-chan kind of overly passionate too......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Kasumi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>She seems like she’d hate to even mention the Hell Triathlon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Who can we ask to put an end to this hell~~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
